import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./Home.css" import Navbar from "./Navbar/Navbar"; import Footer from "./footer/Footer"; export const Home = () => { const email = "email" const [que,setQue]=useState("") const [queArr,setQueArr] = useState([ "Who are you?", "Who are you?", "Who are you?", "Who are you?", ]) const [ansArr,setAnsArr]=useState([ "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", "Let me know!", ]) const handleQuestions = (text) => { setQueArr((prev)=>[...prev,text]) setQue("") } return (
{ queArr.map((item, idx) => { return (
{item} {ansArr[idx]}
) }) }
{ setQue(e.target.value) }}> handleQuestions(que)}>
) }
